Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics

Class DualTextureEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsResource
      • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.Effect
        • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.DualTextureEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEffectFog, IEffectMatrices, IDisposable

    public class DualTextureEffect
extends Effect
implements IEffectMatrices, IEffectFog
    Contains a configurable effect that supports two-layer multitexturing.
    Author:
    Halofreak1990
